messages.content: You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the main topic of the documents?
personal correspondence between the jurist Caleb Hobbhouse and a number of notable legal and spiritual authorities in colonial New England
You are a helpful AI assistant.
When do the letters focus?
the 1690s Arkham Witch Trials
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the content of a few pages in the documents?
geometric or alchemical formulae, with diagrams purported to be from the possession of the convicted witch
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who was the subject of the formulae and diagrams?
Keziah Mason, a convicted witch and child-killer
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What was the main focus of the letters?
The letters focus upon the 1690s Arkham Witch Trials
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who was the convicted witch and child-killer mentioned?
Keziah Mason
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How long is the recommended study period?
6 weeks
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the recommended Mythos Rating?
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What will the attacks on the barriers of reality take the form of?
a series of manifestations of increasing severity
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who should decide the exact nature and frequency of these manifestations?
the Keeper
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Where should the manifestations occur?
in some proximity to either the Witch Trial Papers themselves or to any who have touched them
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who is included in the list of individuals touched by the Witch Trial Papers?
the Cobb family, Leiter’s corpse, Emilia Court, Cecil Hunter, Lucy Stone
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the form of the Horror's attacks on the barriers of reality?
A series of manifestations of increasing severity
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who should decide on the exact nature and frequency of these manifestations?
The Keeper
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What will happen to those nearby when the Horror breaks free?
They will die in an indescribably horrific manner
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What will be the consequence of the Horror breaking free within the bounds of Arkham or the university?
A considerable death toll will occur
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who are some individuals that should experience manifestations of the Horror in Ink?
The Cobb family, Leiter’s corpse, Emilia Court, Cecil Hunter, and whoever the Keeper has selected as the culprit.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to those nearby when the Horror in Ink breaks free?
They die in an indescribably horrific manner, wreaking havoc akin to a sudden tornado before departing.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the purpose of sending a telegram to Professor Charles Leiter?
To provide a suitable additional clue when the investigators become stuck or to add tension.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the nature of the invitation sent to the investigators?
A formal invitation to dinner at Crawford’s Restaurant, with Mister Abner Wick.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who plans to inquire into the death of his business acquaintance?
Mister Abner Wick.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Where is Mister Abner Wick planning to have dinner?
Crawford’s Restaurant in Arkham.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who will immediately snap up the telegram?
Dean Fallon
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Where will the investigators receive a formal invitation to dinner?
Crawford’s Restaurant
